igeo.gui
Interface IGraphics3D

All Superinterfaces:
IGraphics
All Known Subinterfaces:
IGraphicsGL
All Known Implementing Classes:
IGraphicsGL1, IGraphicsGL2, PIGraphics3D
public interface IGraphics3D
extends IGraphics

Class of Graphics to draw 3D geometry (OpenGL or P3D)

Author:
Satoru Sugihara
